entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 60
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
